title: Automatic Time Update and Timezone Settings
description: Force enable the automatic update of date/time, as well as automatically setting the system's current time zone

TMAutomaticTimeOnlyEnabled.title: Force Automatic Date/Time Updates Only
TMAutomaticTimeOnlyEnabled.description: If true, disables the ability to manually set the date and time

TMAutomaticTimeZoneEnabled.title: Set Timezone Automatically
TMAutomaticTimeZoneEnabled.description: If true, force enables setting the Time Zone automatically
